title: Can we expect an IP for chroma sale soon?
body:
I would like to know so I can start preparing.
Also does anyone know how long the sale will take place?

replies.body:
I don't know when the next IP chroma sale is, but as mentioned on our [**Chromas FAQ**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/chromas#faq), there should be two of these sales a year. I don't have any information regarding how long the sale could last or what chromas will be available. Keep an eye on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for any sales announcements.

I hope this helped!
I might have warded it badly, the event where we can buy chroma skins for 2000 IP
